title.@value: Delayed treatment without injury or harm

definition.@value:
Delayed commencement of therapy (e.g. drug therapy, physical therapy, occupational therapy, radiation therapy, surgery, psychological or psychiatric therapy, dressing change, irrigation, etc.).

delayed surgery or procedure

delayed administration of drug or medicament

label.@value: Delayed treatment without injury or harm
delayed administration of drug or medicament without documented injury or harm
delayed commencement of therapy without documented injury or harm
delayed surgery, procedure or intervention without documented injury or harm
